_description: Gospel for Tuesday after Passion Sunday in the ‘expanded’ Northern Homily Cycle

BLHar4196.First Lines: þar efter on a noþer dayOure lord ihesu crist toke þe way…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …Bot none of him þe suth durst spekeAl for drede of þe iewes wreke
BLHar4196.Note: Preceded by Latin, “Ambulabat ihesu crist in galileam.”
BLHar4196.Attributed Title: fferia iii proxima secundum Iohannem (rubric, f. 63va)
BLHar4196.Editions:
Nevanlinna,  Sara. 
             The Northern Homily Cycle: The Expanded Version in MSS Harley 4196 and Cotton Tiberius E.vii.
             3 vols. 
             Memoires de la Societé Neophilologique de Helsinki.
         Helsinki. 38 (1972); 41 (1973); and 43 (1984): II.147-149.
